mapper.select: SELECT C.CLASS_ID, C.CLASS_NAME, C.PRICE, C.CLASS_TIME, C.EXPLANATION, C.DIFFICULTY, C.MEMBER_ID, NVL(TRUNC(AVG(R.REVIEW_STAR),1),0) AS STAR, COUNT(R.REVIEW_ID) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM CLASS_INFO C, REVIEWS R WHERE C.CLASS_ID = R.GROUP_ID(+) AND C.CLASS_ID = #{classId} GROUP BY C.CLASS_ID, C.CLASS_NAME, C.PRICE, C.CLASS_TIME, C.EXPLANATION, C.DIFFICULTY, C.MEMBER_ID

AND BANDATE < SYSDATE ) M WHERE C.CLASS_ID = L.CLASS_ID(+) AND C.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID

SELECT NVL(MIN(C.PRICE),0) FROM CLASS_INFO C, CLASSES L, (SELECT * FROM MEMBERS WHERE STATUS != 'false'

mapper.select: SELECT CLASSES.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKINDS WHERE C_NO = CLASSES.C_NO) AS BOOKING_PEOPLE FROM CLASSES WHERE C_NO = #{cNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(C.START_DATE, 'FMYYYY/MM/DD') AS CLASS_DATE, I.TOTAL_PEOPLE, (SELECT NVL(SUM(TOTAL_PEOPLE),0) FROM BOOKINDS WHERE C_NO = C.C_NO) AS BOOKING_PEOPLE FROM CLASSES C, CLASS_INFO I WHERE C.CLASS_ID = I.CLASS_ID AND C.CLASS_ID = #{classId} AND C.START_DATE > CURRENT_DATE AND C.STATUS = '등록') D WHERE D.TOTAL_PEOPLE > D.BOOKING_PEOPLE

SELECT * FROM (SELECT C.C_NO, C.CLASS_ID, TO_CHAR(C.START_DATE, 'HH24:MI') AS START_TIME, TO_CHAR(C.END_DATE, 'HH24:MI') AS END_TIME, I.TOTAL_PEOPLE, (SELECT NVL(SUM(TOTAL_PEOPLE),0) FROM BOOKINDS WHERE C_NO = C.C_NO) AS BOOKING_PEOPLE FROM CLASSES C, CLASS_INFO I WHERE C.CLASS_ID = I.CLASS_ID AND C.CLASS_ID = #{classId} AND TO_CHAR(C.START_DATE, 'FMYYYY/MM/DD') = #{classDate} AND C.START_DATE > CURRENT_DATE AND C.STATUS = '등록' ORDER BY C.START_DATE) D WHERE D.TOTAL_PEOPLE > D.BOOKING_PEOPLE

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CLASS_INFO WHERE CLASS_DATE > (CURRENT_DATE - 30) AND MEMBER_ID =#{memberId} ORDER BY CLASS_DATE DESC

SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT C.CLASS_ID, C.CLASS_NAME, C.PRICE, NVL(TRUNC(AVG(R.REVIEW_STAR),1),0) AS STAR, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKINDS WHERE C_NO IN (SELECT C_NO FROM CLASSES WHERE CLASS_ID = C.CLASS_ID)AND ORDER_DATE > CURRENT_DATE-30) AS BOOKING_COUNT FROM CLASS_INFO C, REVIEWS R, CLASSES L WHERE C.CLASS_ID = R.GROUP_ID(+) AND C.CLASS_ID = L.CLASS_ID(+) GROUP BY C.CLASS_ID, C.CLASS_NAME, C.PRICE ORDER BY BOOKING_COUNT DESC)A WHERE ROWNUM <= 6
